name: Penguin Slide (NoahRobinson)
description:
A small endless platformer about avoiding obstacles as a penguin in the Antarctic. Dodge ice spikes and leopard seals, and collect fish for money. Unlock new skins and different difficulties in randomly-generated endless levels!

Feel free to leave a comment if you find a bug, or if you're confused about something.

(Unfortunately the online version has a few minor glitches which are fixed in the downloaded version)
